title: LED Poi Juggling Set of 2 – LED Fire Poi for Beginners & Professionals, Kids & Adults | Poi Balls Set with Stunning Colour Effects | Full Poi Kit – 1 Pair of Juggling Balls for All Ages
features: 🚀 𝗨𝗡𝗜𝗤𝗨𝗘 𝗗𝗘𝗦𝗜𝗚𝗡 - Our raindrop-shaped LED Poi balls are perfectly weighted for precise movement. Whether you're a beginner or a skilled spinner, they make an incredible gift for both kids and adults.

💡𝟵 𝗖𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗨𝗥𝗦 & 𝟲 𝗠𝗢𝗗𝗘𝗦 - Choose from a range of vibrant colours and effects, including strobe, fade, and solid colours. Our bright LED Poi balls are perfect for dusk performances, adding extra magic to your shows and playtime.

🔋𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬 𝗕𝗔𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗬 𝗥𝗘𝗣𝗟𝗔𝗖𝗘𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 - Each Poi runs on 3 x LR44 batteries, providing up to 10 hours of glow. The set comes with pre-installed, easily replaceable batteries—so when they run out, you can swap them effortlessly and keep spinning.
💪 𝗗𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 & 𝗦𝗔𝗙𝗘 𝗗𝗘𝗦𝗜𝗚𝗡 - Made from soft yet tough rubber, our Poi balls are long-lasting and painless if you accidentally hit yourself. Unlike many others, they won’t break upon impact.
💫 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗞𝗜𝗗𝗦 & 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗙𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟𝗦 - Our LED Poi balls are loved by kids at home, professionals at festivals, and even circus performers. Suitable for all ages and skill levels!
description: Product Description 9 Colors, 6 Modes 9 COLORS - the LED POI change in blue, red, orange, yellow, purple, light blue, pink, green and white. 6 MODES - rainbow strobe effect, rainbow fade effect, solid white, red strobe effect, green strobe effect, blue strobe effect. For beginners and advanced players Easy to use and with beautiful, bright colors. The loops are made of soft material and are comfortable to hold even when used for a long time. Long-lasting and painless LED POI balls are made of high quality durable soft rubber so it won't hurt even if you hit yourself. They won't break even if you drop them on the floor. Easy battery change Each POI is powered by 3 x LR44 batteries, which allow it to shine brightly for about 10 hours. The 2 POI balls have a complete set of 6 x LR44 batteries installed and are ready to use. Easily replaceable batteries.
